Uses AST-aware parsers and smart validators to extract strings, manage locale JSON, run extract/rewrite/sync scripts, and scaffold drop-in LanguageSwitcher components with a guided first-time setup.

ai-localizer.i18n.enabled.description: Enable React i18n IntelliSense (hover, go to definition, completions for translation keys).

ai-localizer.i18n.defaultLocale.description: Default locale used for hover/definition and when multiple locales are present.

ai-localizer.i18n.localeGlobs.description: Glob patterns (relative to each workspace folder) used to discover locale JSON files.

ai-localizer.i18n.autoTranslate.description: When converting selections to keys, use AI to suggest translations for non-default locales.

ai-localizer.i18n.tImportPath.description: Module path used when inserting `import { t } from '...'` for React i18n helpers.

ai-localizer.i18n.hoverDelayMs.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing i18n hover tooltips. Increase to reduce interference while navigating with keyboard/mouse. Set to 0 to disable the delay.

ai-localizer.openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key used for AI-powered translations. Store this in your user or workspace settings; do not commit it to source control.

ai-localizer.openaiModel.description: OpenAI model ID to use for AI translations (for example, gpt-4o-mini). Set to 'auto' or leave empty to use a cheap default model.

ai-localizer.openaiMaxBatchItems.description: Maximum number of translation keys to send in a single OpenAI request. Lower this if you hit context-limit or rate-limit errors.

ai-localizer.openaiMaxBatchChars.description: Approximate maximum total characters of text to include in a single OpenAI translation batch. Helps keep prompts within the model's context window.

ai-localizer.openaiMaxBatchConcurrency.description: Maximum number of OpenAI translation batches to execute in parallel during bulk translation. Lower this if you hit rate limits; increase cautiously if your account can handle more parallel requests.

ai-localizer.openaiBatchOutputMode.description: Preferred output format for bulk OpenAI translation batches. Choose 'json' to request structured JSON, 'lines' to request one TSV-style line per translation, or 'auto' to let the extension adapt its preferred mode.

ai-localizer.i18n.autoMonitor.description: Automatically monitor files for translation-eligible content and trigger extraction/rewrite when files are committed to git.

ai-localizer.i18n.autoExtract.description: Automatically run extraction script when new translatable content is detected and committed.

ai-localizer.i18n.autoRewrite.description: Automatically run rewrite script after extraction to replace hard-coded strings with translation keys.

ai-localizer.i18n.autoSync.description: Automatically run the i18n:sync script after applying translations so locale JSON files stay in sync and can reuse known translations where possible.

ai-localizer.i18n.diagnostics.enabled.description: Enable Problems panel diagnostics for missing or untranslated locale strings.

ai-localizer.i18n.diagnostics.missingLoc.description: Severity level used when a locale is missing a translation for a key.

ai-localizer.i18n.diagnostics.untranslat.description: Detect locales where the translation value is identical to the default locale (likely untranslated).
Severity level used when a locale value is identical to the default locale value.

ai-localizer.i18n.diagnostics.invalidBas.description: Severity level used when a default-locale translation value looks like an invalid/non-translatable fragment (URLs, query strings, technical tokens, etc.).

ai-localizer.i18n.heuristics.abbreviatio.default: webdav, imap, smtp, pop3, ftp, sftp
ai-localizer.i18n.heuristics.abbreviatio.description: Comma-separated list of well-known protocol or technical abbreviations that should be considered non-translatable when matching exact tokens (used to filter 'untranslated (same as default)' warnings).
